p: There are a few experimental and computational approaches examining the possibility of usage of known antiviral drugs, including those employed for the treatment of viral hepatitis C and antiretroviral drugs, to treat SARS-CoV-2 [ 7, 8, 9]. There are several studies describing the treatment of SARS-CoV-2 using antiretroviral drugs, such as remdesivir [ 10], lopinavir/ritonavir, and darunavir [ 9, 11]. The molecular mechanism of action of lopinavir/ritonavir has been discussed [ 12, 13, 14]. Their application for the treatment of COVID-19 as monotherapies [ 12] or in combination with other drugs [ 13] has been shown.
